alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 8:54AM AKST until February 22 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions, heavy snow, and light freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. The heaviest snow is will be north of Unalakleet. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow items around. A brief period of freezing rain could make surfaces very slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two storms will impact the area. The first system will arrive late Tuesday morning with a brief break Tuesday night before the next system moves into the area Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
